name: Treevilization
description:
Treevilization

For years humanity has been destroying the earth by continuously building infrastructure. Now it is time for nature to strike back and for humanity to go back to its roots. Play a 1vs1 real time strategy experience and conquer planet. Can you claim most of the planet earth for yourself and win the ongoing battle?

How to play:

  1. Create and join the room to be Player 1. Join the created room to be Player 2.
  2. The timer starts when Player 2 is connected. Capture most of the planet before the timer runs out!
  3. Press the reset button at the end of the game to reset rooms and play again. 
  4. Make sure to join a different room when you reset the game.

Visuals - Filipp Aronovits, Ekaterina Serkova.

Programing - Dieko Meijers, Richard Kremer, Filipp Aronovits.

Game Design - Paolo Tomev, Nicklas Risse.

SFX - Nicklas Risse.

Music by - Froll Moss.

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0DqxPV5g0OHwJATLBf3VHE
